content.title: Narrative | Test Writing
content.instructions: Drag the proofreading marks to identify the errors. Type misspelled or missing words.
content.text:
Backyard Camping

Last {u}friday night, Matt and I decided to camp out in the backyard. Dad helped us set up our tent, and Matt and I put our sleeping bags in it{.} Then we put in two flashlights and our food and water. We played a board game until 8:00 P.M., and then we went out back. It wasn’t dark yet, so we played catch for a while{.} Then a big orange ball rose up over the trees. It was the {l}Moon. As it got higher in the sky, it turned white. We went to the tent and crawled into our sleeping bags. We {+|ate} our snacks and talked for a while. I don’t remember falling asleep. Suddenly, the sun was shining into the {-|the} tent, and it was morning.
